meanings.definition: The quality or state of being unalterable.
meanings.sent1: The unalterablenesses of the ancient ruins amazed the archaeologists.
meanings.sent2: The unalterablenesses of the laws of physics govern the universe.
meanings.sent3: Despite his efforts, the magician could not alter the unalterablenesses of his tricks.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was as unalterable as the unalterablenesses of time.
meanings.sent5: The unalterablenesses of the mountain range made it a symbol of strength and endurance.

meanings.definition: The unchangeable nature or characteristic of something.
meanings.sent1: The unalterablenesses of her personality made her a reliable friend.
meanings.sent2: The unalterablenesses of tradition are deeply rooted in our culture.
meanings.sent3: The stubbornness of the old oak tree showed the unalterablenesses of nature.
meanings.sent4: His loyalty to the company was as unalterable as the unalterablenesses of the company's mission.
meanings.sent5: The unalterablenesses of the star's brightness captivated the astronomers.
